caseTitle: Tahir Naqash, etc v. The State, etc
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah
tagline: Minorities being citizen of Pakistan are entitled to the same protection of fundamental rights under the Constitution as any other citizen. Under Article 20 read with Article 14 of the Constitution they are free to profess and practice their religion. Scope an extent of Sections 295-B and 295-C, PPC.
